title: Tournaments
description: Participate in tournaments, compete with other players, and win prizes!
tournament_not_found_message: The tournament you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
bracket_available_soon: The tournament bracket will be available when the tournament starts.
registration_message: Register now to participate in this tournament.
already_registered: You are registered for this tournament
no_matches_yet: No matches have been created yet.
swiss_standings_info: After {{rounds}} Swiss rounds, the top {{qualifying}} players will advance to the elimination phase.
default_rule_1: All matches must be played using the tournament password provided.
default_rule_2: Players have 24 hours to complete their matches after pairings are announced.
default_rule_3: The winner must report the match result.
default_rule_4: In case of a dispute, contact a tournament administrator with proof of the match result.
default_rule_5: Unsportsmanlike conduct may result in disqualification.
no_specific_rules: No specific rules have been set for this tournament.
no_prizes_information: No prize information available for this tournament.
no_tournaments_found: No tournaments found matching your criteria.
check_back_later: Check back later for upcoming tournaments.
password_message: Use this password to join your match and play against your opponent:
swiss_elimination_description: This tournament consists of {{swissRounds}} Swiss rounds followed by a single elimination bracket with the top {{qualifyingPlayers}} players.
single_elimination_description: Single elimination tournament. Lose once and you're out.
double_elimination_description: Double elimination tournament. Players must lose twice to be eliminated.
round_robin_description: Each participant plays against every other participant once.
format_description: Custom tournament format. See rules for details.
